essential_properties.name: queue
essential_properties.description: Queue to send a message to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: message
essential_properties.description: Message to send to the queue

essential_properties.name: messageGroupId
essential_properties.description: Tag that specifies that a message belongs to a specific message group. Applies only to FIFO (first-in-first-out) queues.

common_operations.name: Send Message
common_operations.description: Send a message to a queue
